CustomField.formula:
IF(CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name,"High Touch 1 Market 1"),"High Touch", IF(CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name,"Mid Touch 1 Market 1"),"Mid Touch", IF(CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name,"Tech Touch 1 Market 1"),"Tech Touch",
IF(AND(CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name,"High Touch"), NOT(CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name, "Market 1"))),"Key Account International", IF(AND(CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name,"Mid Touch"), NOT(CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name, "Market 1"))),"SME International", IF(AND(CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name,"Tech Touch"), NOT(CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name, "Market 1"))),"SME International", ""))))))
CustomField.label: Accounttype by Owner
